speaker: SENATOR
text:
Behold
               
              our
               
              patroness
              ,
               
              the
               
              life
               
              of
               
              Rome
              !

speaker: SENATOR
text:
Call
               
              all
               
              your
               
              tribes
               
              together
              ,
               
              praise
               
              the
               
              gods
              ,

speaker: SENATOR
text:
And
               
              make
               
              triumphant
               
              fires
              .
               
              Strew
               
              flowers
               
              before
               
              them
              ,

speaker: SENATOR
text:
Unshout
               
              the
               
              noise
               
              that
               
              banished
               
              Martius
              ,

speaker: SENATOR
text:
Repeal
               
              him
               
              with
               
              the
               
              welcome
               
              of
               
              his
               
              mother
              .
